entries.abort: This is too much, we are out of here.
entries.arrival_phase_1: pcontrast3 Vestil: < pcontrast1 I'm Vestil Kwass.  I work for Nym, and now you work for me.  We are tracking the prisoner ship now, it is odd for one craft to be handed back and forth so much but this is the way they want it. pcontrast3 >
entries.arrival_phase_2: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Target locked in. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Hostile craft detected on attack vector. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Hostile activity has ceased. pcontrast3 >
entries.autorewardbody: I can promise that we will treat those Imperial prisoners better than they would have treated ours.  I have included a 10000 credit bonus for you, keep up the good work.
entries.capture_phase_1: Hurry up, they will send another attack group soon.
entries.capture_phase_2: System restart complete, we will be underway shortly.
entries.complete: pcontrast3 The operation is a success.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 An escorting craft has been destroyed, %DI remain. pcontrast3 >
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 All escorting craft have been destroyed. pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: pcontrast3 Mission Failed: The prisoner ship was destroyed.
entries.failed_escape: pcontrast3 Vestil: < pcontrast1 The Empire has recovered their men, and we have lost ours.  This is hardly a good result. pcontrast3 >
entries.panic_1: They are coming back for more.
entries.quest_disable_d: Target the transport by using the default '[' and ']' keys to cycle to the engine component and destroy it.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the transport safely out of the system.
entries.quest_location_d: Chase down the transport as they flee through the system.
entries.quest_recover_d: Pull up near the disabled craft to begin the recovery process.
entries.recovery_success: pcontrast3 Prisoner Ship: < pcontrast1 We are making our jump now. pcontrast3 >
entries.target_disabled: The Prisoner Ship is disabled, begin the recovery.
entries.taunt_1: The hostages have been declared expendable.
entries.thanks_1: Only a bit more and we are out of here.
entries.thanks_2: Stay focused, they are out to destroy us it appears.
entries.title: Lok System: Contention
entries.title_d: The Storm Squadron, an elite group of Imperial Pilots, have recovered a number of Imperial prisoners in transit to a safe location.  Go liberate that transport from the Imperials and get it back on track.
